description: Located in the historic Anacostia neighborhood of DC, Kramer Middle School is dedicated to serving students in grades 6 through 8. Our faculty and staff work extremely hard to ensure that our students are successful, both inside and outside the classroom. We are committed to providing a high-quality education for all of our students and we constantly seek to help our students develop academically, socially and emotionally.
transit: 92 (U Street-Garfield Line), B2 (Bladensburg Road-Anacostia Line), U2 (Minnesota Avenue-Anacostia Line), V5 (Fairfax Village-L'Enfant Plaza Line), W6 (Garfield-Anacostia Loop Line)
